title: 57. "Hate to See Her Go, Love to Watch Her Leave..." Sad News Update: Lauren is Leaving The Treatment Room + Starting Her Next Chapter.
description:
Hi Roomies!! 

Well, sad day. Lauren is making the tough decision to leave the pod so she can focus all of her energy on her new business!! We are so excited + happy for her. Above all, our message to listeners is that YOU create your own path, and you have the right to change it at any time. And, sometimes even making the "right" decision for you at a certain time can make you sad, and that's okay. We love and support Lauren, and can't wait to see what she does next. She WILL be back!! 

Don't worry, the pod is here to stay, and Tess will be continuing on to bring you all the esty + skin content your hearts desire. Thank you so much for sticking with us and supporting us during this tough transition!

Stay connected with Lauren:

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's YouTube: Lauren Kruger

Lauren's Blog: www.lauren-kruger.com

Music by LiQwYd https://soundcloud.com/liqwyd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
